extension.dc:title: Species Profile
extension.name: SpeciesProfile
extension.dc:description: A basic species profile with characteristics in addition to textural description which are covered by the description extension.

property.name: isMarine
property.dc:description: a boolean flag indicating whether the taxon is a marine organism, i.e. can be found in/above sea water

property.name: isFreshwater
property.dc:description: a boolean flag indicating whether the taxon occurrs in freshwater habitats, i.e. can be found in/above rivers or lakes

property.name: isTerrestrial
property.dc:description: a boolean flag indicating the taxon is a terrestial organism, i.e. occurs on land as opposed to the sea

property.name: isInvasive
property.dc:description: Flag indicating a species known to be invasive/alien in some are of the world. Detailed native and introduced distribution areas can be published with the distribution extension.

property.name: isHybrid
property.dc:description: Flag indicating a hybrid organism. This does not have to be reflected in the name, but can be based on other studies like chromosome numbers etc

property.name: isExtinct
property.dc:description: Flag indicating an extinct organism. Details about the timeperiod the organism has lived in can be supplied below

property.name: livingPeriod
property.dc:description: The (geological) time a currently extinct organism is known to have lived. For geological times of fossils ideally based on a vocabulary like http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geologic_column

property.name: ageInDays
property.dc:description: Maximum observed age of an organism given as number of days

property.name: sizeInMillimeters
property.dc:description: Maximum observed size of an organism in millimeter. Can be either height, length or width, whichever is greater.

property.name: massInGrams
property.dc:description: Maximum observed weight of an organism in grams.

property.name: lifeForm
property.dc:description: A term describing the growth/lifeform of an organism. Should be based on a vocabulary like Raunkiær for plants: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raunkiær_plant_life-form. Recommended vocabulary: http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/life_form.xml

property.name: habitat
property.dc:description: Comma seperated list of mayor habitat classification as defined by IUCN in which a species is known to exist: http://www.iucnredlist.org/static/major_habitats

property.name: sex
property.dc:description: Comma seperated list of known sexes to exist for this organism. Recommended vocabulary is: http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/sex.xml

property.name: datasetID
property.dc:description: An identifier for a subset of data.
